Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.deck

Class PlayableDeck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.deck.PlayableDeck
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameSubject
public class PlayableDeck extends Object implements GameSubject
This class represents the deck of playable cards.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayableDeck

      public PlayableDeck(char deckType, CardFactory cardFactory, int initialCapacity)
      Constructs playable deck of the specified type, with the specified initial capacity. Deck type and card factory type must be equal.
      Parameters:
      deckType - deck type identifier
      cardFactory - deck type card factory
      initialCapacity - initial deck capacity

    • isCompletelyEmpty

      public boolean isCompletelyEmpty()
      Returns true if the face-down pile of the deck is empty and both the revealed cards positions are empty, false otherwise
      Returns:
      true if there are no more drawable cards, false otherwise
